channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Delete Sensitive Messages’—Feds Warn iPhone And Android Users
item.description: Apple's surprise iPhone update doesn't fix this problem — here's what you need to know.

item.title: ‘Fail To Shut Down’—Microsoft Issues Windows Update Warning
item.description: Do not ignore this latest update mistake — here's what you need to know and do.

item.title: Hundreds Of Millions Of iPhones Must Reboot Now—Are You Affected?
item.description: Do not ignore this warning — check your iPhone now and restart immediately.
